title: Knitting
description: I was curious if all wool was itchy... it's not. I also wanted to swap my phone + tv habit for something healthier.

title: Pole Fitness
alt: Me doing a move on the pole
description: I love experimenting with different moves and pushing my body in all the differnet ways.

title: Lyra
alt: Me doing a move on the lyra
description: Once a week, I go to Lyra class. It's important to have play-time and a creative outlet. I'm still afraid of heights though.

title: Polish
description: I've always wanted to learn a second language and since my in-laws are from Poland, it makes it easier to learn.

title: Mentoring
description: I was a teacher for a few years before switching to graphic design then eventually software development. Someday I would love to mentor other devs.

title: Coding
description: I like to code in my spare time. Creating something from nothing is exciting.
